meanings.definition: To hang a dog by the neck until dead.
meanings.sent1: The cruel man doghanged the poor animal in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The farmer had to doghang the rabid dog to protect the other animals.
meanings.sent3: The children gasped in horror as the villain threatened to doghang their beloved pet.
meanings.sent4: The weight of guilt doghanged on his conscience like a heavy chain.
meanings.sent5: The image of the doghanged dog haunted his dreams.

meanings.definition: Used as an expletive or intensifier.
meanings.sent1: Doghanged! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: She exclaimed, 'Doghanged! That was a close call.'
meanings.sent3: Doghanged if I know where I left my keys!
meanings.sent4: The sudden noise made him jump, 'Doghanged!' he shouted.
meanings.sent5: Doghanged, that was the best movie I've ever seen!
